txt.en: The worms infesting the ruins of Fornost are led by an elder named Gajarpan by the Orcs. Gajarpan must be destroyed if the worms are to be driven from Fornost.

'Elsie hates all them worms, but I tell you, Gajarpan is the worst. We heard the Orcs one night as they whispered... scared to come too close, they were. They didn't want Gajarpan to eat them.

'I ain't seen the great worm, but he must be fearsome to scare those Orcs.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Small fellowship recommended.</rgb>

Gajarpan can be found far north of the treasure hunters' camp.

Erl Fisher has asked you to slay Gajarpan, the oldest and most fearsome of worms.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Small fellowship recommended.</rgb>
'Very well done, [placeholder]! That was no small deed.'
Erl Fisher is at the treasure hunters' camp in the ruins of Fornost City.\n\nYou should speak with Erl Fisher.
'That blasted worm Gajarpan has been a thorn in our side...clear him out of those ruins, so we can get about the task at hand!'
'Gajarpan is dead! The Dwarves of Othrikar shall sing your praises forever!'
'You have the gratitude of the Dwarves of Othrikar, [placeholder].'
